trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector"></xref> class should ignore a particular <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"></xref> property while creating an <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"></xref> for a <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"></xref> class.
The MessageSurrogateFilter delegate is intended for use only by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework; you should not instantiate the delegate directly.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> class gets and sets a MessageSurrogateFilter instance.

Each key/value parameter pair is a remoting message property that belongs to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> class.
